```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
cat("Corpus size: ", length(corpus))
cat("Client size: ", length(client))

summarize_programs_sloc <- function(df, packages, types = c("test", "example", "testthat", "vignette")) {
    df %>%
        filter(package %in% packages) %>%
        filter(type %in% types) %>%
        filter(language %in% c("R", "C/C++ Header", "C", "C++", "Fortran 77")) %>%
        mutate(language = case_when(language == "R" ~ "R", TRUE ~ "Native")) %>%
        mutate(type = case_when(type == "testthat" ~ "test", TRUE ~ type)) %>%
        mutate(type = str_to_title(type)) %>%
        group_by(language, type) %>%
        summarize(count = n(), code = sum(code)) %>%
        ungroup()
}
```

# Runnable Code

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
str(sloc_script)

get_relative_program_names <- function(program_names) {
	split_and_join <- function(splits) { 
	    n <- length(splits); 
	    program <- splits[[n - 1]]
	    package <- splits[[n - 2]]
	    type <- splits[[n - 3]]
	    path(type, package, program, ext = "R")
	}
	
	map_chr(path_split(program_names), split_and_join)
}

corpus_programs <- get_relative_program_names(corpus_programs)
client_programs <- get_relative_program_names(client_programs)

all_programs = c(corpus_programs, client_programs)

sloc_script %>%
    mutate(program = path(type, package, filename, ext = "R")) %>%
    filter(program %in% all_programs)

runnable_code <-
   add_column(summarize_programs_sloc(sloc_script, corpus), kind = "Corpus", .before = 1) %>%
   bind_rows(add_column(summarize_programs_sloc(sloc_script, client), kind = "Client", .before = 1)) %>%
   mutate(CountName = paste0(kind, type, "Count"),
          CodeName = paste0(kind, type, "Code"))
   
runnable_code %>% show_table()

MacGen$from_vectors(runnable_code$CountName, label_num(runnable_code$count))
MacGen$from_vectors(runnable_code$CodeName, label_num(runnable_code$code))
```

# Package Code

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
package_code <-
   add_column(summarize_programs_sloc(sloc_package, corpus, c("R", "src")), kind = "Corpus", .before = 1) %>%
   bind_rows(add_column(summarize_programs_sloc(sloc_package, client, c("R", "src")), kind = "Client", .before = 1)) %>%
   group_by(kind, language) %>%
   summarize(count = sum(count), code = sum(code)) %>%
   ungroup() %>%
   mutate(CodeName = paste0(kind, language, "Code"))

MacGen$from_vectors(package_code$CodeName, label_num(package_code$code))
```

# General Corpus Info

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
str(package_dependency)

CorpusDependencyCount <- 
    package_dependency %>% 
    filter(package %in% corpus) %>%
    pull(client) %>%
    unique() %>%
    length()

MacGen$from_args(CorpusDependencyCount = label_comma()(CorpusDependencyCount))

package_by_dependency <- 
    package_dependency %>%
    filter(package %in% corpus) %>%
    count(package, name = "n") %>%
    arrange(desc(n))

maximum_dependency <- slice(package_by_dependency, 1)

MacGen$from_args(CorpusMaximumDependencyPackage = maximum_dependency$package,
                 CorpusMaximumDependencyCount = label_comma()(maximum_dependency$n))

minimum_dependency <- slice_tail(package_by_dependency)

MacGen$from_args(CorpusMinimumDependencyPackage = minimum_dependency$package,
                 CorpusMinimumDependencyCount = label_comma()(minimum_dependency$n))
```

# Package Functions
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
fun_dist <-
    parameters %>% 
    distinct(pack_name, fun_name) %>%
    filter(pack_name %in% corpus)

pack_fun_count <-
    fun_dist %>%
    count(pack_name, name = "function_count") %>%
    arrange(desc(function_count))
    
    
datatable(pack_fun_count)

maximum_fun <- slice(pack_fun_count, 1)

MacGen$from_args(CorpusMaximumFunctionPackage = maximum_fun$pack_name,
                 CorpusMaximumFunctionCount = label_comma()(maximum_fun$function_count))

CorpusTwentyFivePackageCount <- 
    pack_fun_count %>% 
    filter(function_count <= 25) %>% 
    pull(pack_name) %>% 
    unique() %>% 
    length()

CorpusFiftyPackageCount <- 
    pack_fun_count %>%
    filter(function_count > 500) %>% 
    pull(pack_name) %>% 
    unique() %>% 
    length()

MacGen$from_args(CorpusTwentyFivePackageCount = label_comma()(CorpusTwentyFivePackageCount),
                 CorpusFiveHundredPackageCount = label_comma()(CorpusFiftyPackageCount))
                 

cat("Total functions: ", nrow(fun_dist))

fun_dist <-
    fun_dist %>%
    count(pack_name, name = "count") %>%
    mutate(min_range = floor(count/25),
           max_range = ceiling(count/25)) %>%
    mutate(min_range = if_else(min_range == max_range, min_range - 1, min_range)) %>%
    mutate(functions = paste0(min_range * 25 + 1, " - ", max_range * 25)) %>% 
    count(min_range, functions, name = "packages") %>%
    arrange(min_range) %>%
    select(functions, packages)

latex <- pmap_chr(fun_dist, function(functions, packages) {
    paste0(functions, "&", packages, "\\")
})

fun_dist %>% datatable()

cat(latex)
```

# Calls

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}

call_dist <-
    parameters %>%
    filter(pack_name %in% corpus) %>%
    group_by(pack_name, fun_name) %>%
    summarize(call_count = first(call_count)) %>%
    ungroup()
    
called_once_packs <-
    call_dist %>%
    filter(call_count == 1) %>%
    pull(pack_name) %>%
    unique() %>%
    length()
    
cat("Total number of calls:", sum(call_dist$call_count))
cat("Packages whose functions are called only once:", called_once_packs)
    
call_dist <-
    call_dist %>%
    count(call_count, name = "fun_count") %>%
    arrange(desc(fun_count)) %>%
    mutate(cumperc = round(100 * cumsum(fun_count) / sum(fun_count), 2))
    
datatable(call_dist)

call_dist_plot <-
    call_dist %>%
    mutate(call_count = if_else(call_count <= 10, as.character(call_count), "> 10")) %>%
    count(call_count, wt = fun_count, name = "fun_count") %>%
    mutate(relative_fun_count = fun_count/sum(fun_count))
    
datatable(call_dist_plot)

total_function_count <- sum(call_dist_plot$fun_count)

call_dist_plot <-
    call_dist_plot %>%
    ggplot(aes(call_count, relative_fun_count)) + 
    geom_col(fill = "black") +
    scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_axis(~ . * total_function_count,
                                           labels = label_number_si()),
                       labels = label_percent()) +
    scale_x_discrete(limits = c(1:10, "> 10")) +
    coord_flip()+
    labs(x = "Calls", y = "Functions")

save_graph(call_dist_plot, "call_dist")
```
